statements: SELECT * FROM city_climate_actions;
SELECT action_name, responsible_department FROM city_climate_actions WHERE emissions_reduction_goal > 10;
SELECT * FROM city_climate_actions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT action_name, end_date FROM city_climate_actions WHERE responsible_department = 'Environmental Services';
SELECT action_id, action_name, emissions_reduction_goal FROM city_climate_actions ORDER BY emissions_reduction_goal DESC;
SELECT * FROM city_climate_actions ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC, emissions_reduction_goal DESC;
SELECT action_name, responsible_department FROM city_climate_actions WHERE emissions_reduction_goal >= 10;
SELECT MAX(emissions_reduction_goal) AS max_reduction_goal FROM city_climate_actions;
SELECT action_id, action_name, emissions_reduction_goal FROM city_climate_actions WHERE responsible_department = 'Environmental Department' ORDER BY action_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM city_climate_actions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM city_emissions WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_id, emission_category FROM city_emissions WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city_id, emission_category FROM city_emissions WHERE year >= 2020;
SELECT city_id, COUNT(emission_category) AS category_count FROM city_emissions GROUP BY city_id;
SELECT city_id, emission_value FROM city_emissions WHERE year = 2021 AND emission_category = 'CO2';
SELECT city_id, emission_category, emission_value, year FROM city_emissions ORDER BY city_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM emission_goals WHERE goal_year = 2022 ORDER BY goal_id ASC
SELECT emission_value, city_id, year FROM city_emissions WHERE city_id = 5 AND emission_category = 'CO2'
SELECT * FROM city_emissions WHERE emission_value > 100 ORDER BY city_id ASC, year DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT city_id,MAX(emission_value) AS max_emission_value FROM city_emissions GROUP BY city_id HAVING max_emission_value > 500
SELECT * FROM emissions_reduction;
SELECT goal_name, target_emissions FROM emissions_reduction WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, emission_value FROM emissions_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, goal_id, completion_status FROM progress_tracking WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT id, start_date, end_date, target_emissions FROM emissions_reduction WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM emissions_reduction ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT goal_name, end_date FROM emissions_reduction WHERE target_emissions > 10000;
SELECT goal_name, start_date, end_date FROM emissions_reduction WHERE goal_name LIKE '%reduction%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT goal_id, completion_status, progress_notes FROM progress_tracking WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM City;
SELECT CityName, Population FROM City WHERE Population > 100000;
SELECT DISTINCT Country FROM City ORDER BY Country DESC;
SELECT CityName, Country FROM City WHERE CityName LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY CityName ASC;
SELECT CityName, EmissionLevel FROM Emissions WHERE EmissionLevel BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY EmissionLevel DESC;
SELECT * FROM City WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY city_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT city_name, emission_value FROM Emissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' AND year = 2020 ORDER BY emission_value ASC
SELECT * FROM Goals WHERE target_date > '2022-01-01' AND target_value BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY target_date DESC
SELECT city_name, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM Emissions GROUP BY city_name HAVING total_emissions > 1000 ORDER BY total_emissions DESC
SELECT * FROM Progress WHERE completion_status = 'ongoing' AND DATE(completed_date) IS NULL ORDER BY created_date ASC
SELECT * FROM emissions;
SELECT year, emissions_metric FROM progress_report WHERE progress_status='Completed';
SELECT id, year, target_metric FROM target_emissions ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT id, name, title FROM city_officials WHERE title='Mayor';
SELECT * FROM action_items WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM emissions ORDER BY year DESC, emissions_metric DESC;
SELECT year, emissions_metric, target_metric FROM progress_report WHERE progress_status = 'Incomplete';
SELECT name, title FROM city_officials WHERE title = 'Mayor' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM target_emissions WHERE target_metric > 500 AND year BETWEEN 2019 AND 2021;
SELECT action_description, completion_date, status FROM action_items WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
